item.title: SCons rebuilds generated source files every launch
item.description: Problem In a large project that uses SCons, VariantDir, and source code generation, happens one of the following: generated source files are rebuilt every time when scons is launched if .sconsign.dblite is removed manually, scons crashes with the following trace: OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '.sconsign.dblite': File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/SCons/Script/Main.py", line 1372: _exec_main(parser, values) File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/SCons/Script/Main.py", line 1335: _main(parser) File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/SCons/Script/Main.py", line 1099: nodes = _build_targets(fs, options, targets, target_top) File "/usr/lib64/python2.
